Hi Seniors,
 I am a newbie in using Junit. Please let me know if JUnit will=
 be
good enough for web application  testing(server code in java). Is it
tr=
ue that "The JUnit code will be complex and hard to maintain. You
will have=
 to reproduce all of the interactions between code and user
within the Juni=
t test, which very quickly becomes complex. If all you
are doing is testing=
 one single entry point, then this could well
work, but if you are testing =
multiple screens (a wizard or something
like that), then it can quickly bec=
ome fragile and unmanageable."?
